title: Let’s Reenergize!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Morning, Nico-chan...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What’s wrong? You seemed tired......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Nico-chan, I could say the same for you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, it’s pretty obvious! I can’t bring myself to study at all during Golden Week!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I know, right!? We should’ve gotten today off too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yeah~ In times like this, we need to do something to reenergize.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>What should we do? Go and pet the alpacas?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Petting the alpacas won’t be enough. We can still go, though. After school, we should hold a school idol DVD marathon!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ohh~, that’s a great idea! I wanna do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Let’s go tell the others~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
